trans-unit.source: Converts between a string containing a list of font names and an array of strings representing the individual names.
trans-unit.target: 在包含字体名称列表的字符串和表示个别名称的字符串数组之间进行转换。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontNamesConverter.ConvertFrom%2A> method of this class to convert a single string containing a list of font names to an array of strings containing the individual names.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontNamesConverter.ConvertFrom%2A>此类将单个字符串包含到包含单个名称的字符串数组的字体名称的列表的方法。

trans-unit.source: Each font name in the string must be separated by a comma.
trans-unit.target: 必须用逗号分隔字符串中的每个字体名称。

trans-unit.source: For example, the string "arial, times new roman, verdana", converts to an array that contains the strings "arial", "times new roman", and "verdana".
trans-unit.target: 例如，字符串"宋体，次新 roman，verdana"，将转换为数组，其中包含字符串"arial"、"时间新 roman"和"宋体"。

trans-unit.source: Notice the commas are removed along with any white space at the beginning or end of the font name.
trans-unit.target: 请注意逗号将删除所有空格开头或末尾的字体名称。

trans-unit.source: White space in the middle of a font name is not removed.
trans-unit.target: 不删除中间字体名称的空白区域。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontNamesConverter.ConvertTo%2A> method performs the reverse operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontNamesConverter.ConvertTo%2A>方法执行反向操作。

trans-unit.source: It converts an array of strings containing the individual font names to a single string containing a list of the names.
trans-unit.target: 它将包含到单个字符串包含名称的列表的单个字体名称的字符串数组转换。

trans-unit.source: For example, an array that contains the strings "arial", "times new roman", and "verdana" converts to the string "arial,times new roman,verdana".
trans-unit.target: 例如，将一个数组，包含字符串"arial"、"时间新 roman"和"verdana"转换为字符串"宋体，次新 roman，verdana"。

trans-unit.source: Notice that commas are automatically inserted between the font names without any white space.
trans-unit.target: 请注意逗号自动插入之间没有任何空白的字体名称。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontNamesConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A> method to verify that the conversion can be made before calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontNamesConverter.ConvertFrom%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontNamesConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A>方法以验证是否可以在调用之前进行转换<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontNamesConverter.ConvertFrom%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontNamesConverter> class to convert a string with a list of font names to an array of strings containing the individual names.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontNamesConverter>类将字体名称的列表的字符串转换为包含各个名称的字符串数组。

trans-unit.source: The array of strings is then converted back to a single string and displayed.
trans-unit.target: 然后重新转换为单个字符串，显示的字符串数组。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontNamesConverter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontNamesConverter" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: You should never access a type converter directly.
trans-unit.target: 永远不应直接访问的类型转换器。

trans-unit.source: Instead, call the appropriate converter by using a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> object.
trans-unit.target: 相反，通过调用适当的转换器<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>对象。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the examples in <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅中的示例<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> object that provides information about the context of a type converter.
trans-unit.target: 提供类型转换器上下文信息的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: You can optionally pass in <see langword="null" /> for this parameter.
trans-unit.target: 可以选择为该参数传入 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that represents the data type to convert from.
trans-unit.target: 表示要从中转换的数据类型的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether this converter can convert an object of the specified data type to an array of strings containing individual font names.
trans-unit.target: 确定此转换器是否可以将指定数据类型的对象转换为包含个别字体名称的字符串数组。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the type can be converted; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以转换类型，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontNamesConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A> method to determine whether the specified data type can be converted to an array of strings containing individual font names.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontNamesConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A>方法来确定指定的数据类型是否可以转换为包含单个字体名称的字符串数组。

trans-unit.source: This converter can convert only from a `string` data type.
trans-unit.target: 此转换器可以转换只能从`string`数据类型。

trans-unit.source: The `sourceType` parameter must be of type <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: `sourceType`参数的类型必须<xref:System.String>。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this method returns `false` to indicate that the specified data type cannot be converted.
trans-unit.target: 否则，此方法返回`false`以指示不能转换指定的数据类型。

trans-unit.source: You can optionally pass in `null` for the `context` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 可选择传入`null`为`context`参数。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontNamesConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontNamesConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The example determines whether the specified data type can be converted to an array of strings that contains the individual font names before performing the conversion.
trans-unit.target: 该示例确定指定的数据类型是否可以转换为执行转换之前包含单个字体名称的字符串数组。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> object that provides information about the context of a type converter.
trans-unit.target: 提供类型转换器上下文信息的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is not used in this method.
trans-unit.target: 该方法中不使用此参数。

trans-unit.source: It is reserved for future versions of this method.
trans-unit.target: 保留它以供该方法的未来版本使用。

trans-unit.source: You can optionally pass in <see langword="null" /> for this parameter.
trans-unit.target: 可以选择为该参数传入 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> object that represents information about a culture such as language, calendar system, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 表示语言、日历系统等区域性信息的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is not used in this method.
trans-unit.target: 该方法中不使用此参数。

trans-unit.source: It is reserved for future versions of this method.
trans-unit.target: 保留它以供该方法的未来版本使用。

trans-unit.source: You can optionally pass in <see langword="null" /> for this parameter.
trans-unit.target: 可以选择为该参数传入 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Object" /> instance that represents the source string to convert from.
trans-unit.target: 表示作为转换来源的字符串的 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: Converts a string that represents a list of font names into an array of strings containing individual font names.
trans-unit.target: 将表示字体名称列表的字符串转换为包含个别字体名称的字符串数组。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Object" /> instance that represents the array of strings containing the individual font names.
trans-unit.target: 表示包含个别字体名称的字符串数组的 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontNamesConverter.ConvertFrom%2A> method to convert a string containing a list of font names to an array of strings containing the individual names.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontNamesConverter.ConvertFrom%2A>方法将转换包含到包含单个名称的字符串数组的字体名称的列表的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Each font name in the string must be separated by a comma.
trans-unit.target: 必须用逗号分隔字符串中的每个字体名称。

trans-unit.source: For example, the string "arial, times new roman, verdana", converts to an array that contains the strings "arial", "times new roman", and "verdana".
trans-unit.target: 例如，字符串"宋体，次新 roman，verdana"，将转换为数组，其中包含字符串"arial"、"时间新 roman"和"宋体"。

trans-unit.source: Notice that the commas are removed along with any white space at the beginning or end of the font name.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，逗号将删除所有空格开头或末尾的字体名称。

trans-unit.source: White space in the middle of a font name is not removed.
trans-unit.target: 不删除中间字体名称的空白区域。

trans-unit.source: The `context` and `culture` parameters are not used in this version of the method; they are reserved for future versions of the method.
trans-unit.target: `context`和`culture`在此版本的方法不使用参数; 它们是保留针对将来版本的方法。

trans-unit.source: You can optionally pass in `null` for these parameters.
trans-unit.target: 可选择传入`null`为这些参数。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontNamesConverter.ConvertFrom%2A> method to convert a string with a list of font names to an array of strings containing the individual names.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontNamesConverter.ConvertFrom%2A>方法将字体名称的列表的字符串转换为包含各个名称的字符串数组。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is not of type <see cref="T:System.String" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 的类型不是 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> object that provides information about the context of a type converter.
trans-unit.target: 提供类型转换器上下文信息的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is not used in this method.
trans-unit.target: 该方法中不使用此参数。

trans-unit.source: It is reserved for future versions of this method.
trans-unit.target: 保留它以供该方法的未来版本使用。

trans-unit.source: You can optionally pass in <see langword="null" /> for this parameter.
trans-unit.target: 可以选择为该参数传入 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> object that represents information about a culture such as language, calendar system, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 表示语言、日历系统等区域性信息的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is not used in this method.
trans-unit.target: 该方法中不使用此参数。

trans-unit.source: It is reserved for future versions of this method.
trans-unit.target: 保留它以供该方法的未来版本使用。

trans-unit.source: You can optionally pass in <see langword="null" /> for this parameter.
trans-unit.target: 可以选择为该参数传入 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the source array of strings to convert from.
trans-unit.target: 表示作为转换来源的字符串数组的对象。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Object" /> instance object that represents the data type to convert to.
trans-unit.target: 表示转换目标的数据类型的 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 实例对象。

trans-unit.source: This parameter must be of type <see cref="T:System.String" />.
trans-unit.target: 此参数必须是 <see cref="T:System.String" /> 类型。

trans-unit.source: Creates a string that represents a list of font names from an array of strings containing individual font names.
trans-unit.target: 从包含个别字体名称的字符串数组创建表示字体名称列表的字符串。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Object" /> instance that represents a string containing a list of font names.
trans-unit.target: 表示包含字体名称列表的字符串的 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontNamesConverter.ConvertTo%2A> method to convert an array of strings containing the individual font names to a single string containing a list of the names.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontNamesConverter.ConvertTo%2A>方法将转换包含到单个字符串包含名称的列表的单个字体名称的字符串数组。

trans-unit.source: For example, an array that contains the strings "arial", "times new roman", and "verdana" converts to the string "arial,times new roman,verdana".
trans-unit.target: 例如，将一个数组，包含字符串"arial"、"时间新 roman"和"verdana"转换为字符串"宋体，次新 roman，verdana"。

trans-unit.source: Notice that commas are automatically inserted between the font names without any white space.
trans-unit.target: 请注意逗号自动插入之间没有任何空白的字体名称。

trans-unit.source: This converter can convert only to a `string` data type.
trans-unit.target: 此转换器只能转换为`string`数据类型。

trans-unit.source: The `destinationType` parameter must be of type <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: `destinationType`参数的类型必须<xref:System.String>。

trans-unit.source: The `context` and `culture` parameters are not used in this version of the method; they are reserved for future versions of the method.
trans-unit.target: `context`和`culture`在此版本的方法不使用参数; 它们是保留针对将来版本的方法。

trans-unit.source: You can optionally pass in `null` for these parameters.
trans-unit.target: 可选择传入`null`为这些参数。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontNamesConverter.ConvertTo%2A> method to convert an array of strings containing the individual names to a single string that contains a list of font names.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontNamesConverter.ConvertTo%2A>方法将转换的字符串包含到单个字符串包含字体名称的列表的各个名称数组。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="destinationType" /> is not of type <see cref="T:System.String" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="destinationType" /> 的类型不是 <see cref="T:System.String" />。
